sentences.sContent: When I taught, I would assign a topic to children that they would write about.
sentences.sCn: 教书时，我会给孩子们布置个写作题。

sentences.sContent: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker.
sentences.sCn: 卖方经纪人则被要求分给买方经纪人一部分佣金。

sentences.sContent: ...so dutt and her team could assign them a scoer without knowing the gender of the student...
...we re not trying to assign blame or criticize anyone or call anyone conscious Its of this study to open up meaningful dialogues on implicit gender bias...

remMethod.val: as ＋ sign(签名， 做记号) → 签名指派某人做某事 → 指派

words.tran: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让

trans.tranOther: If you assign a piece of work to someone, you give them the work to do.
